items.title: Hugo theme component for JSON feed custom Output Format.
items.summary:
Hugo JSON Feed Hugo theme component for JSON feed custom Output Format.
This component enables JSON feeds for your site.
Demo Home Feed Section Feed Term Feed Install Component The installation method is the same as installing a theme. There are several ways to install, choose one, for example, install through Hugo Modules:
items.content_html:
Hugo JSON Feed

Hugo theme component for JSON feed custom Output Format.

This component enables JSON feeds for your site.

Demo

  • Home Feed
  • Section Feed
  • Term Feed

Install Component

The installation method is the same as installing a theme. There are several ways to install, choose one, for example, install through Hugo Modules:
